resources.string: This item is already in the list!
Just add a number and a message, to which the app should reply. When your phone gets this message from this number, the app will send the location as a reply to it.
Why does this app not work in the background?

Due to Android restrictions, we can\'t guarantee that app will be able to always work in background. Ensure that this app is allowed to run in background (Settings - Apps). Disable battery saver mode.
What is the difference between current and last known location?
Last known location can be sent almost immediately but can be quite outdated.
Why does this app not send the last known location?

The app can send last known location only if the system can provide it. If Android can\'t provide the last known location (for example, because you had GPS disabled for a long time), the app won\'t send it.
What is the difference between Google Location Services and GPS?

Google Location Services is almost always the preferred way to get the location. It uses different device sensors (including GPS) to obtain the location in several tens of seconds. However, sometimes GPS module can provide a more accurate location (but it can take up to several minutes).
How does this app use location permission?
The app uses it to get the location after receiving an appropriate incoming SMS.
How does this app use SMS permission?
The app reads all the incoming SMS to check if it needs to send location as a reply. It doesn\'t store or process your SMS messages in any other way.
How does this app use contacts permission?
This permission is not necessary. You can provide it to use contact picker when creating a new item. If you don\'t provide it, you still will be able to enter the number by yourselves.
The app doesn\'t collect any data. Google Location services are used for location requests. Their use is regulated by Google Privacy Policy.
Choose the location source to use. Every checkbox initiates sending the corresponding SMS.
